name: Rogue AI (MattStov, Goblin)
description:
You're being swarmed by robots! But you are not as alone as you seem...

Hack into your enemies, rewire them to serve you and build an army of robotic comrades to fight the mechanical onslaught.

Catch the elusive USB-Bot and Flop-Bot to collect their precious data for an edge in battle.

WASD - Movement

Dash - Space

Hack - Shift

Shoot - Left click

Grenade - Right Click

---------- known bugs---------------

on player death they are still technically alive (press R to restart)

some blue cards dont do anything (boomerang, multishot, enemy cards)

--------------------------

Updates coming in the future...

Follow for updates on our twitters:

Programmer: Mattstov

Artist: Goblin

Musician: Frogrammer
